title: Machine Learning Fundamentals for Graphene-Based Absorber Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics and calculus, with familiarity with programming concepts
context.additional_context: Blended instruction combining smartphone-based apps and offline group activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and electromagnetic properties of graphene-based absorbers
Learners can compare application cases of five machine learning algorithms including kNN, ANN, and RF
Learners can perform absorber design simulations using smartphone apps in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
